::KitKat::

She smiled. She wasn't used to others addressing her in this manner. 
She blushed slightly as he kissed her hand. "I am proud to have you 
on my council Apocalypse. I thank you for your loyalty. But I can not 
have you kill Drillbit. I care for him very much and do want him 
harmed. But, I would ask that you take Destructor's place as my 
advisor. I would greatly appreciate your council on matters at hand."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Apocalypse grinned. "i think I have much more to offer you then 
that bot. 
> But only at your consent would I dispose of him."he took a knee 
grabbed her 
> hand and kissed it."my queen"
